bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Military endorsement regarding the military service of Walter Reed, February 12, 1903

div1.p: The Auditor for the War Department requests a statement of military service for Reed. They are deciding if Reed is accountable for medical property. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Military endorsement regarding the military service of Walter Reed, February 12, 1903
div1.p:
OFFICE OF SURGEON GENERAL
[unclear]
WAR DEPARTMENT

Requests statement of the
military service of Walter Reed,
late major and surgeon - USA,
who died Nov - 23-1902,
✓

Orig. returned to auditor
(see press copy within)
Feb 17.1903 HGS
